<!-- 
see https://github.com/iastat/citeproc-fix
The \tex{} command will also ensure this is interpreted as tex
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/36902329/tilde-over-n-when-when-converting-from-markdown-to-latex-with-pandoc
-->
\newcommand{\tex}[1]{#1}
\tex{
  \let\oldhypertarget\hypertarget
  \renewcommand{\hypertarget}[2]{\oldhypertarget{#1}{#2}~\\[0in]}
  \specialchapt{BIBLIOGRAPHY}
}
